attributes.action: Reduce the BAC (Blood Alcohol Level) for drivers from the current 80mg/100ml to 50mg/100ml
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current levels of BAC for prosecution are 80mg/100ml and i would like to see that drop to 50mg/100ml that the rest of Europe has on their books. I would also like to see a lifetime ban of the driving privileges if caught 3 times with a BAC of above the legal limit. Too many people are getting killed by repeat offenders and then are let loose again to re-offend.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
